title: Jurats (affidavits, sworn statements, depositions)
dataVerified: Affiant name, date of birth, sworn statement, notary name, notary commission number, oath administration confirmation, notary seal, jurat date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Notary commission status (active/expired/revoked). Link to state notary database (courts and attorneys, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents forged sworn statements in legal proceedings. Domain binding verifies notary commission legitimacy. Court proceedings rely on authenticated sworn testimony. Prevents perjury fraud through tamper-evident notarization. Witness testimony verification for trials and depositions. Notary seal format suitable for OCR. Critical for litigation where sworn statements are key evidence.
